com.air.mobilebrowser
Class BrowserActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.air.mobilebrowser.BrowserActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnInitListener, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnUtteranceCompletedListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, DeviceStatus.DeviceStatusChangeHandler
public class BrowserActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements DeviceStatus.DeviceStatusChangeHandler, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnInitListener, android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech.OnUtteranceCompletedListener

Main activity component of the Secure Browser. Manages the user interaction with the browser from a high level and delegates work in response to requests from the web.

executeAIRMobileFunction

public void executeAIRMobileFunction(java.lang.String functionName,
                                     java.lang.String parameter)
Execute an AIRMobile javascript function. eg. calling executeAIRMobileFunction("someFunction", "someParam"); Executes AIRMobile.someFunction('someParam'); in the webview, and logs the javascript to the console.

Parameters:
functionName - the name of the AIRMobile function.
parameter - the parameters to pass in the function.
